root.string: Use the 2024 D&D Rules as Your Default?

Do you want to use the new D&D 2024 Rules by default?\r\n\r\nYou can use both the 2024 D&D rules and the Legacy rules interchangeably, but this will set the default choice whenever you create a new game element record. You can change this at any time in the Campaign Options sidebar menu.
Paste item list data here.\r\rFormatting is NOT preserved.
Paste the item text here.\r\rFormatting is NOT preserved.
Paste a stat block here.\r\rFormatting is NOT preserved.
Paste your description text here.\r\rYou can include bold, italic, lists, links, or anything else that would be relevant for the description.
Paste the species text here.\r\rFormatting is NOT preserved.

[ERROR] One or more data records (features, traits, inventory, spells) were unable to be loaded. Please ensure that your Player's Handbook or Basic Rules - Player modules are loaded; and re-add the pregen character.
[ERROR] Link for NPC '%s' is not working. Make sure the correct modules have been opened in the Library.
Double-click to use a slot, or click to edit.
[ERROR] Unable to locate spell group to resolve spell modifiers or DCs.
[ERROR] Unable to locate spellcasting trait to resolve spell modifiers or DCs.
[ERROR] Unable to locate innate spellcasting trait to resolve spell modifiers or DCs.

Drag and drop library or campaign equipment to this window. The template(s) in the Magic Item Templates window will be applied to each piece of equipment in this window when the Forge Magic Item button is clicked.

Drag and drop library magic item templates to this window. The magic item template(s) in this window will be applied to each equipment entry in the Equipment window when the Forge Magic Item button is clicked.
Error, please add items before attempting to forge!
Off Hand. Weapon off-hand bonus applies to Primary Hand attacks.
Off Hand (Defense). Weapon defense bonus applies to Combat Defense.
